Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Roscoe
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses temp. rerouted NB: Ashland, Lincoln, Addison and Ashland; SB: Ashland, Addison, Southport, Belmont and Ashland due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Ashland/Roscoe.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Lincoln, Addison and Ashland.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Addison, Southport, Belmont and Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.
